text: My card wasn't working, so I went to the control station and eventually, the in charge gave me a free pass to where I'm going next. so grateful to be traveling in Singapore with such amazing service. thank you SMRT!
MRT station quiet mostly, best to stop here then a foot-walk of 3 mins, go to Then Cafe at Hamilton road nearby. Nice coffee break, healthly value food, hot-desk, fast WIFI.
Nice clean station and helpful staff. Ticketing system is not the most intuitive though.
Had issues with card tapping out. Customer service was useless & unhelpful
Quite a pleasant station with pastel color
